extendedInfo.description: Cute and hand drawn style theme for your android phone. Kawaii!This is a free version of my "Chalk Your Way" theme for Go Launcher EX. Please check out "Chalk Your Way Theme" and download it. It has plenty more wallpapers with different colors of Red, Pink, Purple, Blue, Green, and Black. And a lot more icons!Check out my other themes as well. Search "colourmefancy" Thanks!This is a theme for Go Launcher Ex. Please download Go Launcher Ex before downloading the theme.Feel free to email me at colourmefancy@gmail.com for any requests or inquiries. Thank you. Enjoy!Instructions on how to apply theme:1. Do Not open app directly after it has been installed, it will just force close because this is a theme and not an app.2. Go to Go Launcher EX through your menu button - Menu > Themes3. Choose and apply theme

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: One of the most boring themes ever!
reviews.author: A Google User
